o.name: IBIZA CHEMISE (satin)
o.desc:
Chemise for warm summer days or hot winter nights. Gently fits woman figure, providing maximum comfort. You can adjust shoulder straps to pull this short chemise up or down or to regulate the depth of your cleavage. You can shorten shoulder straps to hold the chemise close to your body, or extend them to seduce your men. We recommend this chemise as both as a nice lingerie for a relaxing sleep and a key element of many passionate evenings. Ibiza chemise is packed in an elegant box, so if you're looking for a gift ideas - take a look at Kalimo lingerie products.
Style:
body fitted ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions adjustable satin shoulder straps total length (measured along the side seam): 57cm (22in).
Material:
high quality satin premium softness on the inside high satin gloss outer side
Additional product features:
adjustable satin shoulder straps packed in a beautiful, large box (perfect gift idea)

Short satin chemise with original lace cleavage will attract every men's eyes. It's tempting tear-shape makes a perfect combination with the beauty of a womans figure.Adjustable shoulder straps allow you to decide how deep you cleavage should be. The bottom of Cordoba chemise is finished with the same lace, which gives a harmonious look. Cordoba is a good choice for ladies who love the glamorous details and appreciate high quality comfort.
Style:
body fitted ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions adjustable satin shoulder straps total length (measured along the side seam): 70cm (27in).
Material:
high quality satin premium softness on the inside high satin gloss outer side
Additional product features:
adjustable satin shoulder straps packed in a beautiful, large box (perfect gift idea)

o.name: CAIRO CHEMISE
o.desc:
Cairo chemise is made from high quality see-thru fabric, that covers your body in an unique way. „Water-wave” cleavage stimulates imagination and senses. Small satin bows add some delicacy. Chemise comes with matching thongs included. Cairo is a great idea for intimate randezvous.

o.name: ARGENTINA CHEMISE (satin)
o.desc:
A good choice for woman who like to cover their legs in a tempting way. This long chemise is made from high quality smooth satin that covers your body in an exceptional way. Fitted in the upper part and wide enough at the bottom, makes every woman feel sexy in it. Adjustable straps allow you to regulate the cleavage accoring to your desires. Wear Argentina, light a candle and feel extremely beautiful... Chemise packed in an elegant, large box, so if you're looking for a gift idea - that's the perfect solution.

o.name: PANAMA DRESSING-GOWN (satin)
o.desc:
Beautiful dressing-gown, made of delicate satin, is a mandatory part of wardrobe for every woman. Irreplaceble in any situation. Sleeves that give you the ability to wear it in two ways: rolled up cuffs or simple sleeve. A simple, short satin dressing-gown admire with its elegance. Panama is wrapped in an elegant, large box, so if you're looking for a gift ideas - that's the perfect solution.

o.name: AMAZONIA DRESSING-GOWN (viscose)
o.desc:
Elegance combined with sexiness and mysticism. This dressing-gown is a necessary part of a stylish night lingerie collection of every woman. Incredibly comfortable and practical dressing-gown made of viscose. What is more the dressing-gown makes a perfect set with any Kalimo’s chemise. Large hood, ¾ cuff sleeves, waist belt, side pocket - every woman will find something she likes in this dressing-gown, and will feel great while wearing it. The hood can be worn in several ways. You can nestle into it completely, shade morning light or elegantly spread it on your shoulders – everything depends on your liking. Mystical princess in the night, lark awakening to life in the morning at the doorstep of the terrace hiding under the soft hood… Breakfast, coffee… You will love the comfort it provides.
Style:
comfortable, well-fits appropriate parts of body rovides high wearing comfort provides elasticity of the fabric in proper directions total length of dressing-gown measured on the side seam: 69cm
Fabric:
high quality breathable viscose, so called “wood silk” appropriate softness and elasticity lightness, breathability
Additional features:
large hood, which also functions as a collar belt underlining waist pocket placed on the right side of the dressing-gown the dressing-gown can be fastened, so it does not falls off while wearing he dressing-gown is packaged in wonderful, large box (perfect as a gift)

o.name: MOROCCO SET (viscose)
o.desc:
Sexy, and at the same time, wonderfully comfortable viscose set, dedicated to women who like to introduce fresh ideas into their night lingerie collection. The set is composed of longer shirt and pants (boxer shorts). The shirt entwines in a way which covers buttocks. So if you are in a right mood, you can wear just the shirt… Décolletage is sensually underlined by soft black frill in flower theme, whereas the bottom of the shirt is finished with black tasteful frill which makes it light and delicate. Morocco set is a blend of elegance, comfort and sensuality. There is no doubt that this combination will be a nice accent in your bedroom... Set is packaged in nice and large box, so it’s perfect as a gift.
Style:
comfortable, well-fits appropriate parts of body provides high wearing comfort deep, lacy décolletage shirt finishing made of delicate frill total length of the shirt measured on the side seam: 51cm
Fabric:
high quality breathable viscose, so called “wood silk” appropriate softness and elasticity lightness, breathability
Additional features:
the set includes pants decorated with frill adjustable shoulder straps lingerie is packaged in a beautiful, large box (perfect as a gift)

o.name: MOROCCO SET (viscose)

o.name: BERMUDA SET (satin)
o.desc:
Created for women who do not necessarily like chemises, but value elegant night lingerie. We have created another satin set which is composed of shirt and shorts. The shirt as well as the shorts is finished with tulle frill which makes it look coquettishly. The shirt was cut in a way which makes both big as well as smaller bust look magnificently. Special notice deserves delicate frill placed near the décolletage because it nicely underlines the shape of woman’s breasts… Style:
well-fits appropriate parts of body provides high wearing comfort provides elasticity of the fabric in proper directions provides proper fabric work (a pouring satin effect) total shirt length measured on the side seam: 45cm
Fabric:
high quality, thick satin high gloss on the outer side high quality weave wysokiej jakości splot
Additional features:
bust and shorts are finished with tulle frill lingerie is packaged in beautiful, large box (perfect as a gift)

o.name: COSTA RICA CHEMISE (viscose)
o.desc:
Light viscose chemise with sexy design and length that makes it end just before knees, is a great proposition which will set you in a good mood at any time of a year. Appropriate fit at the level of bust and waist, makes it not just sexy, but also very comfortable. What makes it even more elegant are lacy shoulder straps, filled with ornaments, flowing down on the moderately deep décolletage. The bottom of the chemise is airy and underlines its lightness. Tempting Costa Rica is a chemise for women who value night lingerie that provides high comfort, and at the same time has a pinch of sexiness. The chemise is packaged in an elegant box, so it’s perfect as a gift.

o.name: MEXICO CHEMISE (satin)
o.desc:
Most certainly, stylish chemise which ends just before knees attracts attention with its subtle flower lace, which entwines bust cups, giving them tempting look. The bottom of the chemise is finished with the same lace, which creates perfect harmony. Adjustable length of shoulder straps will let you decide how deep should be the lacy indention. The chemise will make a fine addition to an elegant collection of night lingerie and is a great idea for the beginning of a passionate evening. The chemise is packaged in impressive, large box to satisfy gift tastes of almost every woman.
Style:
well-fits appropriate parts of body provides high wearing comfort provides elasticity of the fabric in proper directions provides proper fabric work (a pouring satin effect) total length measured on the side seam: 63cm
Fabric:
high quality, thick satin high quality, soft lace made in flower theme appropriate softness on the inner side high gloss on the outer side high quality weave
Additional features:
bust finishing made of soft lace thin, adjustable shoulder straps in the color of the chemise lingerie is packaged in beautiful, large box (perfect as a gift)

The bottom of the chemise is finished with the same lace, which creates perfect harmony. Adjustable length of shoulder straps will let you decide how deep should be the lacy indention. The chemise will make a fine addition to an elegant collection of night lingerie and is a great idea for the beginning of a passionate evening. The chemise is packaged in impressive, large box to satisfy gift tastes of almost every woman.
Style:
well-fits appropriate parts of body provides high wearing comfort provides elasticity of the fabric in proper directions provides proper fabric work (a pouring satin effect) total length measured on the side seam: 63cm
Fabric:
high quality, thick satin high quality, soft lace made in flower theme appropriate softness on the inner side high gloss on the outer side high quality weave
Additional features:
bust finishing made of soft lace thin, adjustable shoulder straps in the color of the chemise lingerie is packaged in beautiful, large box (perfect as a gift)

The decent Bahama-Set consists of a shirt and a three quarter pants. The shirt invites with its lace inlays which blends with the middle part at the cleavage. The transparent lace is flirtatious and graceful, and makes the body look slim. The total effect is rounded up by the comfortable trousers with a fashionable leg cut. Incredibly attractive, comfortable and sensual. The ideal choice for a lazy evening and a hot night.

o.name: JAMAICA SET(viscose)
o.desc:
Playful set of soft viscose satisfies the expectations of any woman. The shirt has a timeless „oversize” cut. The naughty sleeve cuts with little bows at their ends undoubtedly attract attention. The shirt can be worn in two ways, depending on the mood: loose or slightly tied up. The whole is completed by the shorts which carry the same ruffle as the shirt cleavage. All of it marked by lightness. The ideal offer for women caring for elegance and comfort.
Style:
comfortable, a perfect fit highest freedom of movement stretching in respective directions crew neck shirt and shorts subtly ruffled total length of the shirt: 21 ¾" total length of the shorts measured at the side seam: ca.7 ¾".
Material:
high-quality, breathing viscose, the so called „woodsilk” desired softness and elasticity lightness, air permeability
Further product features:
lace panty included in the set sleeve cuts the underwear is packed into a beautiful box (ideal as a gift)

o.desc:
Incredibly stylish feminine camisole „Barcelona“ was designed especially for lovers of simple and elegant attire. The „Carmen” cleavage, which can be pulled down on one or both arms will accentuate its line seductively. The chiffon sleeves on the other hand, with their ruffles, give the camisole lightness and unimagined girlishness. The camisole is manufactured from a very soft and skin-friendly fabric, thus allowing for the highest comfort. The „Barcelona“ camisole is packed in an elegant box, perfectly suitable as a gift.
The design:
comfortable, fitting perfectly guaranteed carefree and high wearing comfort guaranteed stretching of fabric in desired directions total length of the camisole measured along the side seam: 57cm
The fabric:
soft, stretchy material fitting adequately light, breathable
Extra product properties:
„Carmen” type cleavage decorative, satin ribbon on the breasts Chiffon sleeves underwear packed in a beautiful, big box (ideal as a gift)

o.name: FLORENCE SET (viscose)
o.desc:
Who says that a comfortable and cuddly pajama has to be boring? The „Florence“ set composed of trousers and a long-sleeve blouse is a sublime composition with obviously feminine design. The trousers with a classic straight cut make your legs optically slenderer. The blouse is a combination of breathing viscose and a tulle-like, soft fabric in the cleavage area which emphasizes even smaller breasts. Every woman falls for this pajama and winter nights do not have to be cold...
The design:
comfortable, fitting perfectly guaranteed carefree and high wearing comfort guaranteed stretching of fabric in desired directions Cleavage area made from soft tulle total length measured along the side seam: 38cm total length of trousers measured from the crutch: 73cm
The fabric:
high-quality, breathing viscose, a so called „wood silk” adequately soft and stretchy light, breathable
Extra product properties:
cleavage made from soft, high-quality tulle 2 trouser pockets underwear packed in a beautiful, big box (ideal as a gift)

o.name: CASABLANCA SET (knitwear)
o.desc:
The „Casablanca” Set is an incredibly sensual and originally feminine offer by Kalimo. This unconventional set consists of two pieces: the top mad from eye-catching lace which flows out of the breast line onto the straps and the shorts forming an ideal composition with the t-shirt. The slightly bell-shaped top and its length guarantee lightness and high wearing comfort. The sophisticated Casablanca is a fashionable and tasteful offer for romantic evenings.
The design:
comfortable, fitting perfectly guaranteed carefree and high wearing comfort guaranteed stretching of fabric in desired directions total length measured along the side seam: ca. 45cm total length of shorts measured along the side seam: ca.16cm
The fabric:
soft, stretchy material high quality lace light, breathable
Extra product properties:
adjustable straps decorations on the straps underwear packed in a beautiful, big box (ideal as a gift)

o.name: ALEKSANDRIA SET (knitwear)
o.desc:
The apparently simple „Aleksandria” set is in reality an incredibly sensual and teasing composition. The uniform lower part of the t-shirt encloses softly the body while the impressive upper part made from double layered tulle visibly emphasizes the breasts providing a natural push-up effect. The cleavage is apparently simple in this set but accomplished in every way. Every appreciator will at once recognize the branded underwear by Kalimo. The double net on the breasts does not reveal everything straight away and the fabric lays itself radially in waves to emphasize the curves of a woman’s breasts. The close-fitting blouse enters the cleavage area like a wedge forming a perfectly round border line. Adjustable straps are decorated by tiny teasing ribbons. In a beautiful box you will also find fitting comfortable shorts harmonizing well with the t-shirt.
The design:
comfortable, fitting perfectly guaranteed carefree and high wearing comfort guaranteed stretching of fabric in desired directions total length measured along the side seam: ca. 45cm total length of shorts measured along the side seam: ca. 23,5cm
The fabric:
soft, stretchy material smooth, soft tulle light, breathable
Extra product properties:
adjustable straps decorative ribbons on the straps underwear packed in a beautiful, big box (ideal as a gift)

The cleavage is apparently simple in this set but accomplished in every way. Every appreciator will at once recognize the branded underwear by Kalimo. The double net on the breasts does not reveal everything straight away and the fabric lays itself radially in waves to emphasize the curves of a woman’s breasts. The close-fitting blouse enters the cleavage area like a wedge forming a perfectly round border line. Adjustable straps are decorated by tiny teasing ribbons. In a beautiful box you will also find fitting comfortable shorts harmonizing well with the t-shirt.
The design:
comfortable, fitting perfectly guaranteed carefree and high wearing comfort guaranteed stretching of fabric in desired directions total length measured along the side seam: ca. 45cm total length of shorts measured along the side seam: ca. 23,5cm
The fabric:
soft, stretchy material smooth, soft tulle light, breathable
Extra product properties:
adjustable straps decorative ribbons on the straps underwear packed in a beautiful, big box (ideal as a gift)

o.name: ALICANTE CHEMISE (satin)
o.desc:
An unbelievably subtle and decent camisole with a definitely girlish character. The underwear made of flowing satin with a ruffle of tulle will be attractive for every woman. The camisole emphasizes both the cleavage and the shoulders giving the body lightness and elegance at the same time. The comfortable length (half thigh length) causes you to feel carefree in such a camisole. The whole is completed by a ruffled thong. The nightdress is perfect for casual and very special nights.
Style:
fitting perfectly guaranteed carefree and high wearing comfort fabric stretching in desired directions fabric works as expected (flowing-satin-effect) total length of the camisole measured along the side seam: 54cm (21,26in).
Material:
high quality satin premium softness on the inside smooth tulle ruffle
Additional product features:
adjustable satin shoulder straps packed in a beautiful, large box (perfect gift idea)

The comfortable length (half thigh length) causes you to feel carefree in such a camisole. The whole is completed by a ruffled thong. The nightdress is perfect for casual and very special nights.
Style:
fitting perfectly guaranteed carefree and high wearing comfort fabric stretching in desired directions fabric works as expected (flowing-satin-effect) total length of the camisole measured along the side seam: 54cm (21,26in).
Material:
high quality satin premium softness on the inside smooth tulle ruffle

o.name: INDIANA CHEMISE (viscose)
o.desc:
The smooth and soft (longer) viscose camisole is another proposition by Kalimo which suits perfectly as pyjama for the night but also as a dress for breakfast on the patio. The camisole is made of natural fabric (viscose) and drapes the woman’s body softly by giving it natural comfort whereas the fancy sleeves provide the appearance a frivolous character. The fitting length of the camisole and the fabric it is made of give you the choice: pyjama or dress? Whatever you feel like...
Style:
comfortable, well–fits appropriate parts of body provides high wearing comfort viscose sleeves crew neck total length of shirt measured on the side seam: 59cm (23,23inch).
Fabric:
high quality breathable viscose, so called “wood silk” appropriate softness and elasticity lightness, breathability
Additional features:
fancy viscose sleeves lingerie is packaged in beautiful, large box (perfect as a gift))

o.name: LIBERIA DRESSING-GOWN (satin)
o.desc:
A night at the fireplace? A morning with aromatic coffee? Give yourself a moment of peace... Beneath a sexy pyjama, over it the Liberia bathrobe and you can treasure the peaceful moment of happiness a little longer each day. See for yourself how fancy and sexy you can start and end every day with Kalimo. The bathrobe „Liberia” may cover the naked body and some short underwear, above all the fitting satin models by Kalimo. Liberia surely is elegant (just look at the lace on the sleeves, the smooth collar passing fluently into the cleavage) and taste depending on the mood. You can wear the bathrobe in various ways: set the collar upright, hitch up the sleeves, skip the belt. Maybe you like cuff sleeves more? Maybe you bind the belt around your waist to emphasize your body shape? Bind the belt on the side? At the front? Everything depends on you.... We have a small suggestion for you - if you want you can combine this bathrobe with the „Odessa“ camisole by Kalimo. Odessa and Liberia are decorated with the same lace. A combo gift? Why not! :)
Style:
body fitted ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions satin strap for perfect waist fitting total length (measured along the side seam): 55cm (21,65in).
Material:
high quality satin high softness on the inside smooth, fine lace
Additional product features:
a waist belt packed in a beautiful, large box (perfect gift idea)

Beneath a sexy pyjama, over it the Liberia bathrobe and you can treasure the peaceful moment of happiness a little longer each day. See for yourself how fancy and sexy you can start and end every day with Kalimo. The bathrobe „Liberia” may cover the naked body and some short underwear, above all the fitting satin models by Kalimo. Liberia surely is elegant (just look at the lace on the sleeves, the smooth collar passing fluently into the cleavage) and taste depending on the mood. You can wear the bathrobe in various ways: set the collar upright, hitch up the sleeves, skip the belt. Maybe you like cuff sleeves more? Maybe you bind the belt around your waist to emphasize your body shape? Bind the belt on the side? At the front? Everything depends on you.... We have a small suggestion for you - if you want you can combine this bathrobe with the „Odessa“ camisole by Kalimo. Odessa and Liberia are decorated with the same lace. A combo gift? Why not! :)
Style:
body fitted ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions satin strap for perfect waist fitting total length (measured along the side seam): 55cm (21,65in).
Material:
high quality satin high softness on the inside smooth, fine lace
Additional product features:
a waist belt packed in a beautiful, large box (perfect gift idea)

o.name: FIJI SET (satin)
o.desc:
The satin set „Fiji” is the quintessence of what a woman needs for the evening, the night and the morning. A short and light t-shirt with shorts. Simple but unbelievably erotic underwear. A set which emphasizes the womanliness and awakes the senses. Glossy, flowing satin. Excellently cut. The waist is being accentuated, the back exposed. The deep cleavage can be adjusted with straps. The most sensual and most fancy in a simple combination. The satin is very smooth and nice to touch. It is soft and glossy at the same time. You get convinced when allowing the camisole for the first time to leave the packing so it can perfectly fit your body.
Style:
body fitted ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions total length of the camisole measured along the side seam: 40cm (15,75inch) total length of the shorts measured along the side seam: 20cm (7,87inch).
Material:
high quality satin premium softness on the inside high satin gloss outer side
Additional product features:
exposes the back almost completely adjustable straps packed in a beautiful, large box (perfect gift idea)

o.name: ODESSA CHEMISE (satin)
o.desc:
„Odessa” is a chemise with character. Apparently simple but actually very sophisticated. The breast splitting line which runs over the back as well is a characteristic which becomes striking at the first sight. Kalimo is known for ideally fitting underwear and this is also a property of this camisole which can be seen in the design of the breast part. The cups made of satin make a bra obsolete even with fuller breasts. They are not tight at the same time but made of smooth, flowing satin. The depth of the cleavage can be adjusted with straps. o.name: MIAMI SET (viscose)
o.desc:
„Miami” is very short but fancy underwear combining comfort (natural fibre) with sex appeal (very tight). Something which had been missing among underwear until now. The t-shirt, it is no secret, is short. All to show the stomach and the decoration of the panty which attracts the same way the t-shirt does. The lace also runs along the t-shirt and the shorts giving the set a sporty and predatory look. The set was designed for summer days and warm nights. You will not cover much with it but you will surely feel comfortable. The underwear is tight and fits perfectly. It emphasizes the feminine shapes and is nice to touch (viscose is a natural and air permeable fabric). f you want you can blur the boundaries between underwear and everyday clothes. You can leave the house wearing a t-shirt. If it is warm you may go to the garden, to the beach or for a quick shopping. Don’t worry. Only your second half will know it is underwear… :)
Style:
comfortable, sporty, fitting perfectly provides high wearing comfort fabric stretching in desired directions total length of the nightdress measured along the side seam: 36cm (14,17inch) total length of the shorts measured along the side seam: 18cm (7,09inch)
Fabric:
high quality breathable viscose, so called “wood silk” smooth, stretchy lace lightness, breathability
Additional features:
fancy transparent lace at the sides of the t-shirts and the shorts adjustable shoulder straps lingerie is packaged in a beautiful, large box (perfect as a gift)

o.name: MIAMI SET (viscose)
o.desc:
„Miami” is very short but fancy underwear combining comfort (natural fibre) with sex appeal (very tight). Something which had been missing among underwear until now. The t-shirt, it is no secret, is short. All to show the stomach and the decoration of the panty which attracts the same way the t-shirt does. The lace also runs along the t-shirt and the shorts giving the set a sporty and predatory look. The set was designed for summer days and warm nights. You will not cover much with it but you will surely feel comfortable. The underwear is tight and fits perfectly. It emphasizes the feminine shapes and is nice to touch (viscose is a natural and air permeable fabric). f you want you can blur the boundaries between underwear and everyday clothes. You can leave the house wearing a t-shirt. If it is warm you may go to the garden, to the beach or for a quick shopping. Don’t worry. Only your second half will know it is underwear… :)

o.name: ESPERANZA CHEMISE (satin)
o.desc:
This chemise is extraordinary. It is obvious that only very few women have it in their closets. Very fancy and seductive underwear which will make you very sexy and which your partner will not pass by indifferently..The chemise is made of smooth satin with lace sewn in letting a glimpse of the skin‘s nakedness through. Get dressed with the „Esperanza” camisole and feel as if you stood in a rain of lacy flowers. An incredibly feminine model - owing to the design and the lace. The romantic Esperanza, fitting perfectly tight to the body, will satisfy even the most sublime tastes.
Style:
body fitted ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions adjustable satin shoulder straps total length (measured along the side seam): 62cm (24,41in).
Material:
high quality satin premium softness on the inside soft lacy flowers
Additional product features:
adjustable satin shoulder straps packed in a beautiful, large box (perfect gift idea)

o.name: IMPERIA SET (satin)
o.desc:
The „Imperia” set is a novelty by Kalimo. It is a pyjama which resembles a suit but its purpose is fully different.Imperia is a traditional set with feminine design composed of a buttoned-up t-shirt and shorts. The upper part is tapered accentuating the shapes of the woman’s body. Elaborately finished with edging it emphasizes in a contrasting and elegant way the cut of the set (both the t-shirt’s and the shorts‘). The t-shirt is buttoned-up but you can of course unbutton it. . Suitable as everyday pyjama and for courageous ladies for business trips.
Style:
body fitted ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions total length of the blouse measured along the side seam: 39cm (15,35inch) total length of the shorts measured along the side seam: 21cm (8,27inch)
Material:
high quality satin premium softness on the inside satin edging in contrasting colours
Additional product features:
blouse tapered, buttoned-up packed in a beautiful, large box (perfect gift idea)

o.name: IMPERIA SET (satin)
o.desc:
The „Imperia” set is a novelty by Kalimo. It is a pyjama which resembles a suit but its purpose is fully different.Imperia is a traditional set with feminine design composed of a buttoned-up t-shirt and shorts. The upper part is tapered accentuating the shapes of the woman’s body. Elaborately finished with edging it emphasizes in a contrasting and elegant way the cut of the set (both the t-shirt’s and the shorts‘). The t-shirt is buttoned-up but you can of course unbutton it. . Suitable as everyday pyjama and for courageous ladies for business trips.
Style:
body fitted ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions total length of the blouse measured along the side seam: 39cm (15,35inch) total length of the shorts measured along the side seam: 21cm (8,27inch)
Material:

o.name: ROME SET (viscose)
o.desc:
Made of cosy viscose with a lacy heart „Rome“ is a comfortable pyjama for women in any age. The blouse with a casual cut manages to hide imperfect aspects of the body. Thanks to the crew neck you may uncover on or both shoulders. The perfectly cut shorts will wonderfully accentuate the round shapes of the woman’s bottom. As a whole it is a perfect set perfectly fitting to your body. In addition to that the design combines the feminine charm with comfort.
Style:
comfortable, sporty, fitting perfectly provides high wearing comfort total length of the nightdress measured along the side seam: 38cm (14,96inch) total length of the shorts measured along the side seam: 15cm (5,91inch)
Fabric:
high quality breathable viscose, so called “wood silk” soft, stretchy lace lightness, breathability
Additional features:
the lacy heart is relined with viscose comfortable sleeves lingerie is packaged in a beautiful, large box (perfect as a gift)

o.name: MALAGA CHEMISE (satin)
o.desc:
Elegance and sensuality in a simple form - this is how you would describe the Malaga Camisole. Made from flowing satin it smoothly clings to the body. Decorated with expressive lace which continues into straps the camisole develops an individual character. The two small bows give the whole girlishness. Half-thigh length and adjustable straps provide more comfort. The Malaga Camisole is an offer for those women who prefer simple solutions with that certain something though.
Style:
body fitted ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions adjustable satin shoulder straps total length (measured along the side seam): 23,22".
Material:
high quality satin premium softness on the inside soft lacy
Additional product features:
adjustable satin shoulder straps packed in a beautiful, large box (perfect gift idea)

Elegance and sensuality in a simple form - this is how you would describe the Malaga Camisole. Made from flowing satin it smoothly clings to the body. Decorated with expressive lace which continues into straps the camisole develops an individual character. The two small bows give the whole girlishness. Half-thigh length and adjustable straps provide more comfort. The Malaga Camisole is an offer for those women who prefer simple solutions with that certain something though.
Style:
body fitted ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions adjustable satin shoulder straps total length (measured along the side seam): 23,22".
Material:
high quality satin premium softness on the inside soft lacy
Additional product features:
adjustable satin shoulder straps packed in a beautiful, large box (perfect gift idea)

o.name: RIO SET (knitwear)
o.desc:
The frivolous Rio Set is made of soft, perfectly fitting knitwear. . The breast shape is emphasized by ideally clinging, stretchy lace which in addition supports the bosom very well. The lower part in contrastful colours waves beautifully. The whole is completed by a lovely thong made of the same lace as the camisole. Straps are adjustable so it is you who decide about the depth of the cleavage.
The design:
comfortable, fitting perfectly guaranteed carefree and high wearing comfort guaranteed stretching of fabric in desired directions total length measured along the side seam: ca. 24,8"
The fabric:
soft, stretchy material high quality lace light, breathable
Extra product properties:
adjustable straps underwear packed in a beautiful, big box (ideal as a gift)

o.name: PARIS CHEMISE (viscose)
o.desc:
The Paris Camisole: a fancy shirt with sensational lace over the bosom. Designed for women who like long-sleeved nightdresses with pockets. The camisole is a perfect accessory for women of every age and body shape. The stylish combination of single-colour viscose with noticeable lace is a synonym for good taste.
Style:
comfortable, well-fits to appropriate parts of body provides high wearing comfort provides elasticity of the fabric in proper directions décolletage made of lace in shape of flowers total length of the shirt measured on the side seam: 24,8"
Fabric:
high quality breathable viscose, so called “wood silk” appropriate softness and elasticity lightness, breathability
Additional features:
décolletage finish made of soft, high quality lace lingerie is packaged in a beautiful, large box (perfect as a gift)

o.name: MADRID CHEMISE (satin)
o.desc:
An incredibly light and girlish camisole of flowing satin with transparent mesh. Cups are made half from satin and half from a smooth mesh - they give the breasts solid support and tease with transparent parts at the same time. The lower part is decorated with delightful ruffle made from the same mesh as the décolleté. Everything is comfortably adjustable by straps.
Style:
body fitted ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions adjustable satin shoulder straps total length (measured along the side seam): 23,22".
Material:
high quality satin smooth, fine mesh high satin gloss outer side
Additional product features:
adjustable satin shoulder straps packed in a beautiful, large box (perfect gift idea)

At the first glance a simple and yet a very seducing sexy camisole - Catania. The upper part resembles a top enriched with little tulle sleeves. The camisole consists of smooth, stretchy knitwear which sensually clings to your body emphasizing its round shapes. t is ideal for an evening for two you may start with dinner and go on wherever your fantasy takes you.

comfortable, fitting perfectly guaranteed carefree and high wearing comfort guaranteed stretching of fabric in desired directions total length measured along the side seam: ca. 27,5"

soft, stretchy material smooth, soft tulle light, breathable

o.name: ALEGRANZA DRESSING-GOWN (viscose)
o.desc:
The robe of smooth viscose will sensually envelop your body. The belt is designed in a way to allow you to tie it at the side or around your body to emphasize your waist. The classic cut with hood, long sleeves and two convenient pockets must not miss in any woman’s wardrobe. Expressive decorations give the robe an extraordinary look.
Style:
comfortable, well-fits appropriate parts of body rovides high wearing comfort provides elasticity of the fabric in proper directions total length of dressing-gown measured on the side seam: 28,35"
Fabric:
high quality breathable viscose, so called “wood silk” appropriate softness and elasticity lightness, breathability
Additional features:
hood, which also functions as a collar belt underlining waist 2 pockets he dressing-gown is packaged in wonderful, large box (perfect as a gift)

o.name: GRACIOSA SET (viscose)
o.desc:
The unparalleled delightful and comfortable Graciosa set made of breathing viscose is undoubtfully the ideal bedroom accessory for women of any age. The upper part consists of a t-shirt with wider straps, decorated by fanciful lace. The whole is completed by shorts lined by the same lace. The set is ornamented by small bows. Girlish, light and pleasant to wear - these are the qualities of Graciosa.
Style:
comfortable, a perfect fit highest freedom of movement stretching in respective directions crew neck shirt and shorts subtly ruffled total length of the shirt: 19 ¾" total length of the shorts measured at the side seam: ca.7 ¾".
Material:
high-quality, breathing viscose, the so called „woodsilk” desired softness and elasticity lightness, air permeability
Further product features:
lace panty included in the set the underwear is packed into a beautiful box (ideal as a gift)

The upper part consists of a t-shirt with wider straps, decorated by fanciful lace. The whole is completed by shorts lined by the same lace. The set is ornamented by small bows. Girlish, light and pleasant to wear - these are the qualities of Graciosa.
Style:
comfortable, a perfect fit highest freedom of movement stretching in respective directions crew neck shirt and shorts subtly ruffled total length of the shirt: 19 ¾" total length of the shorts measured at the side seam: ca.7 ¾".
Material:
high-quality, breathing viscose, the so called „woodsilk” desired softness and elasticity lightness, air permeability
Further product features:
lace panty included in the set the underwear is packed into a beautiful box (ideal as a gift)

o.name: SEVILLE CHEMISE (viscose)
o.desc:
Light and girlish for romantic nights. Seville perfectly fits to the woman’s body emphasizing its curves and giving a romantic feeling to evening moments. It is thanks to the heart decoration, fashionably in this season. In the lacy weave under the bust line you will find something what used to be a symbol of feelings brought towards another person. For whom will you dress with this camisole? To whom will you give your heart? Show those feelings at the next possible occasion…
Style:
comfortable, fitting the right body parts ensuring high wearing comfort Lace-braided heart total length of the camisole measured along the side seam: 64cm
The fabric:
top quality, breathing viscose, the so called „wood silk” softness and elasticity lightness, air permeability
Extra product properties:
viscose trimming finished cleavage underwear packed in a beautiful, big box (ideal as a gift) fabric composition: 95% viscose, 5% elastane

Light and girlish for romantic nights. Seville perfectly fits to the woman’s body emphasizing its curves and giving a romantic feeling to evening moments. It is thanks to the heart decoration, fashionably in this season. In the lacy weave under the bust line you will find something what used to be a symbol of feelings brought towards another person. For whom will you dress with this camisole? To whom will you give your heart? Show those feelings at the next possible occasion…
Style:
comfortable, fitting the right body parts ensuring high wearing comfort Lace-braided heart total length of the camisole measured along the side seam: 64cm
The fabric:
top quality, breathing viscose, the so called „wood silk” softness and elasticity lightness, air permeability
Extra product properties:
viscose trimming finished cleavage underwear packed in a beautiful, big box (ideal as a gift) fabric composition: 95% viscose, 5% elastane

o.name: GRANADA SET (satin)
o.desc:
Two-part, sensual set consisting of a t-shirt and shorts made of smooth satin. The shirt on wide straps is accentuated by a splitting line under the bust. Owing to the high-end cut it perfectly emphasizes the cleavage. The shorts are finished with fitting lace. The whole set perfectly fits the body and guarantees wearing comfort..
Style:
fitting the right body parts ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions total length of the camisole measured along the side seam: 43cm (15,75inch) total length of the shorts measured along the side seam: 20cm (7,87inch).
The fabric::
high quality satin premium softness on the inside delicate lace
Additional product features:
wide, comfortable straps underwear packed in a beautiful, big box (ideal as a gift) fabric composition: 97% polyester, 3% elastane. Satin weave

o.name: GALICIA CHEMISE (viscose)
o.desc:
Incredibly elegant and chic Galicia Camisole made from breathing viscose is another product offer by Kalimo for the upcoming season. The cleavage is ornamented by delicate lace which fluently changes over to straps and coquettishly exposes and holds the bust. The whole is completed by a charming bow making it more elegant. The lower part is finished with the very same lace. All of this created for the needs of your next romantic night :)
Style:
comfortable, well–fits appropriate parts of body provides high wearing comfort cleavage decorated with delicate lace in floral pattern total length of shirt measured on the side seam: 67cm.
The Fabric:
high quality breathable viscose, so called “wood silk” appropriate softness and elasticity lightness, breathability
Additional features:
cleavage and lower part of the camisole finished with thick lace lingerie is packaged in beautiful, large box (perfect as a gift)) fabric composition: 95% viscose, 5% elastane)

The lower part is finished with the very same lace. All of this created for the needs of your next romantic night :)
Style:
comfortable, well–fits appropriate parts of body provides high wearing comfort cleavage decorated with delicate lace in floral pattern total length of shirt measured on the side seam: 67cm.
The Fabric:
high quality breathable viscose, so called “wood silk” appropriate softness and elasticity lightness, breathability
Additional features:
cleavage and lower part of the camisole finished with thick lace lingerie is packaged in beautiful, large box (perfect as a gift)) fabric composition: 95% viscose, 5% elastane)

o.name: ALTEA SET (viscose)
o.desc:
Original lingerie made for lovers of exquisite style and comfort. The combination made from body friendly viscose with alluring decoration in form of a deep lace cleavage will satisfy the taste of every woman. Depending on own preferences or mood you may decide how you want to wear it yourself – you can adjust the separating line with an elastic at waist or hips. The Altea set will prove perfect both as pyjamas and a seductive part of your wardrobe for a romantic evening.
Style:
comfortable, well–fits appropriate parts of body provides high wearing comfort cleavage decorated with delicate lace in floral pattern total length measured to the elastic separating line along the side seam: 36cm total length of shorts measured along the side seam: 26cm.
The Fabric:
high quality breathable viscose, so called “wood silk” appropriate softness and elasticity lightness, breathability
Additional features:
cleavage finished with delicate lace in floral pattern lingerie is packaged in beautiful, large box (perfect as a gift) fabric composition: 95% viscose, 5% elastane

o.name: CARTAGENA SET (viscose)
o.desc:
Incredibly girlish and romantic pajamas in the fashionable during this season boho style. The upper part is a loose blouse finished with ruffles which fits perfectly any bust size (also the bigger one). The lower part are slack shorts in a casual cut which give bottom cheeks special rounding. The whole perfectly shapes the woman’s body: from the shoulders down to the narrow waist to the round hips and bottom cheeks. Thanks to using high-quality viscose the set is very smooth and comfortable. Ideal for a romantic night as well as for a lazy morning. For more confident ladies for every moment of rest in the living room, the patio, the garden...
Style:
comfortable, well–fits appropriate parts of body provides high wearing comfort shorts decorated with a contrasty bow total length of t-shirt measured along the side seam: 36cm total length of shorts measured along the side seam: 26cm.
The Fabric:
high quality breathable viscose, so called “wood silk” appropriate softness and elasticity lightness, breathability
Additional features:
charming ruffles lingerie is packaged in beautiful, large box (perfect as a gift) fabric composition: 95% viscose, 5% elastane)

o.name: TOLEDO SET (satin)
o.desc:
An alluring and shapely set made of comfortably feeling satin. The t-shirt with a wave-shaped cleavage nicely emphasizes the feminine bust. The lower part is ornamented with delicate lace to add subtleness. The shorts are ornamented with the same lace. The legs are finished with coquettish cracks. Ideal for sleeping or a nice beginning of a night with a lover.
Style:
body fitted ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions adjustable satin shoulder straps total length of camisole measured along the side seam: 37cm total length of shorts measured along the side seam: 21cm
The Fabric:
high quality satin premium softness on the inside delicate lace
Additional product features:
adjustable satin shoulder straps packed in a beautiful, large box (perfect gift idea) fabric composition: 97% polyester, 3% elastane. Satin weave

An alluring and shapely set made of comfortably feeling satin. The t-shirt with a wave-shaped cleavage nicely emphasizes the feminine bust. The lower part is ornamented with delicate lace to add subtleness. The shorts are ornamented with the same lace. The legs are finished with coquettish cracks. Ideal for sleeping or a nice beginning of a night with a lover.
Style:
body fitted ensuring high wearing comfort ensuring the flexibility of the fabric in right directions adjustable satin shoulder straps total length of camisole measured along the side seam: 37cm total length of shorts measured along the side seam: 21cm
The Fabric:
high quality satin premium softness on the inside delicate lace
Additional product features:
adjustable satin shoulder straps packed in a beautiful, large box (perfect gift idea) fabric composition: 97% polyester, 3% elastane. Satin weave

o.name: PODOMKA MARBELLA (satyna)
o.desc:
Kusząca, a zarazem elegancka satynowa podomka, która powinna się znaleźć w garderobie każdej kobiety. Połączenie rękawów o długości 3/4 z szeroką koronką dodaje lekkości i kobiecości. Szlafrok zalotnie wiązany w pasie, wykończony dołem na półokrągło – romantyczny i jednocześnie niesamowicie zmysłowy. Twój pomysł na wieczór? Ty wybierasz. Chcesz podkreślić kobiecą sylwetkę – przewiąż szlafroczek w pasie, a uzyskasz efekt smukłej figury. Chcesz wyglądać anielsko? Rozwiąż szlafroczek i po prostu przejdź się po pokoju… Lekkość satyny sprawi, że podomka zafaluje. To nie wiatr. To efekt Twojej gracji... Do podomki Marbella można dokupić halkę Merida, uzyskując tym samym niezwykle efektowny, nocny komplet, który pozwoli Ci nadać charakteru chwilom, w zależności od Twoich upodobań.
Styl:
dopasowany do odpowiednich partii ciała zapewniający wysoki komfort noszenia zapewniający elastyczność materiału w odpowiednich kierunkach zapewniający odpowiednią pracę materiału (efekt lejącej się satyny) satynowy pasek podkreślający talię całkowita długość mierzona po szwie bocznym: 65cm. całkowita długość rękawa mierzona od pachy w dół: 36cm.
Materiał:
wysokogatunkowa , mięsista satyna delikatna, szeroka koronka wysoki połysk po stronie zewnętrznej wysokiej jakości splot
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
satynowy pasek szerokie rękawy zakończone piękną koronką bielizna pakowana w śliczne, duże opakowanie (idealne na prezent) skład materiału: 97% poliester, 3% elastan. Splot satynowy.

Szlafrok zalotnie wiązany w pasie, wykończony dołem na półokrągło – romantyczny i jednocześnie niesamowicie zmysłowy. Twój pomysł na wieczór? Ty wybierasz. Chcesz podkreślić kobiecą sylwetkę – przewiąż szlafroczek w pasie, a uzyskasz efekt smukłej figury. Chcesz wyglądać anielsko? Rozwiąż szlafroczek i po prostu przejdź się po pokoju… Lekkość satyny sprawi, że podomka zafaluje. To nie wiatr. To efekt Twojej gracji... Do podomki Marbella można dokupić halkę Merida, uzyskując tym samym niezwykle efektowny, nocny komplet, który pozwoli Ci nadać charakteru chwilom, w zależności od Twoich upodobań.
Styl:
dopasowany do odpowiednich partii ciała zapewniający wysoki komfort noszenia zapewniający elastyczność materiału w odpowiednich kierunkach zapewniający odpowiednią pracę materiału (efekt lejącej się satyny) satynowy pasek podkreślający talię całkowita długość mierzona po szwie bocznym: 65cm. całkowita długość rękawa mierzona od pachy w dół: 36cm.
Materiał:
wysokogatunkowa , mięsista satyna delikatna, szeroka koronka wysoki połysk po stronie zewnętrznej wysokiej jakości splot
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
satynowy pasek szerokie rękawy zakończone piękną koronką bielizna pakowana w śliczne, duże opakowanie (idealne na prezent) skład materiału: 97% poliester, 3% elastan. Splot satynowy.

o.name: HALKA MERIDA (satyna)
o.desc:
Uwodzicielska, elegancka, seksowna! Tak w trzech słowach można określić halkę Merida. Łącząc delikatną satynę ze zmysłową koronką uzyskaliśmy ekskluzywną propozycję, która idealnie sprawdzi się na miły początek każdego wieczoru. Dekolt został tak zaprojektowany, aby dobrze podtrzymywać biust, jednocześnie zbierając piersi do środka. Wycięcie, choć głębokie, jest subtelnie przykryte koronką usłaną delikatnymi kwiatami. Dla wielbicielek kompletów - możliwość dokupienia podomki Marbella z tej samej serii. Całość tworzy niezwykle kuszące połączenie elegancji i zmysłowości. Gorąca propozycja na wyjątkowy wieczór. Haleczka pakowana jest w eleganckie, dwuczęściowe opakowanie, więc jeśli szukasz czegoś na prezent to koniecznie zobacz propozycje bielizny marki KALIMO.
Styl:
dopasowany do odpowiednich partii ciała zapewniający wysoki komfort noszenia zapewniający elastyczność materiału w odpowiednich kierunkach zapewniający odpowiednią pracę materiału (efekt lejącej się satyny) całkowita długość halki mierzona po szwie bocznym: ok.57cm.
Materiał:
wysokogatunkowa , mięsista satyna odpowiednia miękkość po wewnętrznej stronie wysoki połysk po stronie zewnętrznej delikatna, szeroka koronka
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
bielizna pakowana w śliczne, duże opakowanie (idealne na prezent) skład materiału: 97% poliester, 3% elastan. Splot satynowy.

o.name: HALKA MERIDA (satyna)
o.desc:
Uwodzicielska, elegancka, seksowna! Tak w trzech słowach można określić halkę Merida. Łącząc delikatną satynę ze zmysłową koronką uzyskaliśmy ekskluzywną propozycję, która idealnie sprawdzi się na miły początek każdego wieczoru. Dekolt został tak zaprojektowany, aby dobrze podtrzymywać biust, jednocześnie zbierając piersi do środka. Wycięcie, choć głębokie, jest subtelnie przykryte koronką usłaną delikatnymi kwiatami. Dla wielbicielek kompletów - możliwość dokupienia podomki Marbella z tej samej serii. Całość tworzy niezwykle kuszące połączenie elegancji i zmysłowości. Gorąca propozycja na wyjątkowy wieczór. Haleczka pakowana jest w eleganckie, dwuczęściowe opakowanie, więc jeśli szukasz czegoś na prezent to koniecznie zobacz propozycje bielizny marki KALIMO.
Styl:
dopasowany do odpowiednich partii ciała zapewniający wysoki komfort noszenia zapewniający elastyczność materiału w odpowiednich kierunkach zapewniający odpowiednią pracę materiału (efekt lejącej się satyny) całkowita długość halki mierzona po szwie bocznym: ok.57cm.
Materiał:
wysokogatunkowa , mięsista satyna odpowiednia miękkość po wewnętrznej stronie wysoki połysk po stronie zewnętrznej delikatna, szeroka koronka
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
bielizna pakowana w śliczne, duże opakowanie (idealne na prezent) skład materiału: 97% poliester, 3% elastan. Splot satynowy.

o.name: KOMPLET RONDA (satyna)
o.desc:
Nietuzinkowy komplet Ronda, wykonany z lśniącej satyny, to kolejna propozycja bielizny nocnej marki Kalimo. Ten komplet jest niezwykle wyrafinowany: wyjątkowy krój, oryginalne odcięcie uroczą falbanką, satynowe szorty. Całość zdobiona czarną, elegancką koronką. Bielizna dla Pań szukających wyjątkowego stylu. Styl:
dopasowany do odpowiednich partii ciała zapewniający wysoki komfort noszenia zapewniający elastyczność materiału w odpowiednich kierunkach zapewniający odpowiednią pracę materiału (efekt lejącej się satyny) całkowita długość koszulki po szwie bocznym: 37cm całkowita długość szortów po szwie bocznym: 17cm
Materiał:
wysokogatunkowa , mięsista satyna odpowiednia miękkość po wewnętrznej stronie delikatna, miękka koronka wysokiej jakości splot
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
regulowane narami odcięcie gumką na lini bioder bielizna pakowana w śliczne, duże opakowanie (idealne na prezent) skład materiału: 97% poliester, 3% elastan. Splot satynowy.

wysokogatunkowa , mięsista satyna odpowiednia miękkość po wewnętrznej stronie delikatna, miękka koronka wysokiej jakości splot
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
regulowane narami odcięcie gumką na lini bioder bielizna pakowana w śliczne, duże opakowanie (idealne na prezent) skład materiału: 97% poliester, 3% elastan. Splot satynowy.

o.name: KOMPLET RONDA (satyna)
o.desc:
Nietuzinkowy komplet Ronda, wykonany z lśniącej satyny, to kolejna propozycja bielizny nocnej marki Kalimo. Ten komplet jest niezwykle wyrafinowany: wyjątkowy krój, oryginalne odcięcie uroczą falbanką, satynowe szorty. Całość zdobiona czarną, elegancką koronką. Bielizna dla Pań szukających wyjątkowego stylu. Styl:
dopasowany do odpowiednich partii ciała zapewniający wysoki komfort noszenia zapewniający elastyczność materiału w odpowiednich kierunkach zapewniający odpowiednią pracę materiału (efekt lejącej się satyny) całkowita długość koszulki po szwie bocznym: 37cm całkowita długość szortów po szwie bocznym: 17cm

o.name: KOMPLET CALPE (wiskoza)
o.desc:
Niezwykle wygodna oraz przyjemna wiskozowa piżamka zapewni dobry sen nie tylko w zimowe noce. Góra to koszulka z długim rękawem oraz uroczą szyfonową falbanką. Dół to komfortowe spodnie z dwiema kieszeniami oraz falbanką przy odcięciu gumki. Komplet, w którym z powodzeniem możesz usiąść do leniwego śniadania również na tarasie. Propozycja dla Pań ceniących elegancję oraz komfort podczas snu.
Styl:
komfortowy, dopasowany do odpowiednich partii ciała zapewniający wysoką swobodę noszenia zapewniający elastyczność materiału w odpowiednich kierunkach spodnie oraz bluzka zdobione tiulową falbanką całkowita długość spodni mierzona od kroku: 76cm długość rękawa mierzona od pachy w dół: ok.40cm
Materiał:
wysokogatunkowa, oddychająca wiskoza, tzw. "jedwab drzewny" odpowiednia miękkość, elastyczność lekkość, przewiewność
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
urocze falbanki 2 kieszenie w spodniach bielizna pakowana w śliczne, duże opakowanie (idealne na prezent) skład materiału: 95% wiskoza, 5% elastan.

wysokogatunkowa, oddychająca wiskoza, tzw. "jedwab drzewny" odpowiednia miękkość, elastyczność lekkość, przewiewność
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
urocze falbanki 2 kieszenie w spodniach bielizna pakowana w śliczne, duże opakowanie (idealne na prezent) skład materiału: 95% wiskoza, 5% elastan.

o.name: KOMPLET CALPE (wiskoza)
o.desc:
Niezwykle wygodna oraz przyjemna wiskozowa piżamka zapewni dobry sen nie tylko w zimowe noce. Góra to koszulka z długim rękawem oraz uroczą szyfonową falbanką. Dół to komfortowe spodnie z dwiema kieszeniami oraz falbanką przy odcięciu gumki. Komplet, w którym z powodzeniem możesz usiąść do leniwego śniadania również na tarasie. Propozycja dla Pań ceniących elegancję oraz komfort podczas snu.
Styl:
komfortowy, dopasowany do odpowiednich partii ciała zapewniający wysoką swobodę noszenia zapewniający elastyczność materiału w odpowiednich kierunkach spodnie oraz bluzka zdobione tiulową falbanką całkowita długość spodni mierzona od kroku: 76cm długość rękawa mierzona od pachy w dół: ok.40cm
Materiał:
wysokogatunkowa, oddychająca wiskoza, tzw. "jedwab drzewny" odpowiednia miękkość, elastyczność lekkość, przewiewność
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:

o.name: KOMPLET LUGO (wiskoza)
o.desc:
Dwuczęściowy, wiskozowy komplet składający się z koszulki z rękawkami oraz fantazyjnych szortów jest wygodną, a zarazem elegancką alternatywą do tradycyjnych piżamek. Dekolt bluzki zdobi koronka. Szorty stanowią natomiast kombinację tradycyjnych majteczek oraz spodenek: przód jest wykonany z koronki podszytej wiskozą w części majtkowej, tył natomiast to wiskoza, która miękko przylega do ciała, podkreślając krągłości pośladków.
Styl:
komfortowy, sportowy, dopasowany do odpowiednich partii ciała zapewniający wysoki komfort noszenia dekolt oraz szorty zdobione miękką koronką w kwiatowym motywie całkowita długość koszulki po szwie bocznym: 31cm całkowita długość szortów po szwie bocznym: 19cm
Materiał:
wysokogatunkowa, oddychająca wiskoza, tzw. ”jedwab drzewny” miękka, elastyczna koronka odpowiednia miękkość oraz elastyczność lekkość, przewiewność
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
wykończenie dekoltu oraz dołu szorów z miękkiej, elastycznej koronki wygodne rękawki bielizna pakowana w śliczne, duże opakowanie (idealne na prezent) skład materiału: 95% wiskoza, 5% elastan.

wysokogatunkowa, oddychająca wiskoza, tzw. ”jedwab drzewny” miękka, elastyczna koronka odpowiednia miękkość oraz elastyczność lekkość, przewiewność
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
wykończenie dekoltu oraz dołu szorów z miękkiej, elastycznej koronki wygodne rękawki bielizna pakowana w śliczne, duże opakowanie (idealne na prezent) skład materiału: 95% wiskoza, 5% elastan.

o.name: KOMPLET LUGO (wiskoza)
o.desc:
Dwuczęściowy, wiskozowy komplet składający się z koszulki z rękawkami oraz fantazyjnych szortów jest wygodną, a zarazem elegancką alternatywą do tradycyjnych piżamek. Dekolt bluzki zdobi koronka. Szorty stanowią natomiast kombinację tradycyjnych majteczek oraz spodenek: przód jest wykonany z koronki podszytej wiskozą w części majtkowej, tył natomiast to wiskoza, która miękko przylega do ciała, podkreślając krągłości pośladków.
Styl:
komfortowy, sportowy, dopasowany do odpowiednich partii ciała zapewniający wysoki komfort noszenia dekolt oraz szorty zdobione miękką koronką w kwiatowym motywie całkowita długość koszulki po szwie bocznym: 31cm całkowita długość szortów po szwie bocznym: 19cm
Materiał:
wysokogatunkowa, oddychająca wiskoza, tzw. ”jedwab drzewny” miękka, elastyczna koronka odpowiednia miękkość oraz elastyczność lekkość, przewiewność

o.name: KOMPLET VIGO (wiskoza)
o.desc:
Dziewczęca i lekka piżamka wykonana z przyjemnej dla ciała wiskozy. Górę stanowi bluzka o luźnym kroju. Na uwagę zwraca kieszeń wykonana z dużego serca w kontrastowym kolorze. Natomiast mniejsze serce zdobi jedną z nogawek spodni o długości ¾. Dopełnieniem jest lamówka zarówno na koszulce jak i na nogawkach, kolorem nawiązująca do serc. Propozycja dla Pań nietuzinkowych, lubiących wygodę i subtelność podczas snu.
Styl:
komfortowy, dopasowany do odpowiednich partii ciała zapewniający wysoką swobodę noszenia zapewniający elastyczność materiału w odpowiednich kierunkach bluzka oraz spodnie zdobione wiskozowym sercem w kontrastowym kolorze długość rękawa mierzona od ramienia: ok.58cm długość nogawki mierzona od kroku w dół: ok.43cm
Materiał:
wysokogatunkowa, oddychająca wiskoza, tzw. "jedwab drzewny" odpowiednia miękkość, elastyczność lekkość, przewiewność
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
serduszko-kieszeń bielizna pakowana w śliczne, duże opakowanie (idealne na prezent) skład materiału: 95% wiskoza, 5% elastan.

komfortowy, dopasowany do odpowiednich partii ciała zapewniający wysoką swobodę noszenia zapewniający elastyczność materiału w odpowiednich kierunkach bluzka oraz spodnie zdobione wiskozowym sercem w kontrastowym kolorze długość rękawa mierzona od ramienia: ok.58cm długość nogawki mierzona od kroku w dół: ok.43cm
Materiał:
wysokogatunkowa, oddychająca wiskoza, tzw. "jedwab drzewny" odpowiednia miękkość, elastyczność lekkość, przewiewność
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
serduszko-kieszeń bielizna pakowana w śliczne, duże opakowanie (idealne na prezent) skład materiału: 95% wiskoza, 5% elastan.

o.name: KOMPLET VIGO (wiskoza)
o.desc:
Dziewczęca i lekka piżamka wykonana z przyjemnej dla ciała wiskozy. Górę stanowi bluzka o luźnym kroju. Na uwagę zwraca kieszeń wykonana z dużego serca w kontrastowym kolorze. Natomiast mniejsze serce zdobi jedną z nogawek spodni o długości ¾. Dopełnieniem jest lamówka zarówno na koszulce jak i na nogawkach, kolorem nawiązująca do serc. Propozycja dla Pań nietuzinkowych, lubiących wygodę i subtelność podczas snu.
Styl:

o.name: HALKA BALI (satyna)
o.desc:
Luksusowa i niezwykle elegancka halka Bali zadowoli nawet najbardziej wymagające klientki. Haleczka została wykonana z najwyższej jakości bardzo miękkiej, elastycznej satyny w delikatnym pudrowym różu z nadrukiem szarych różyczek. Dekolt oraz dół koszulki zdobi fantazyjna koronka, która w kuszący sposób podkreśla biust. Model ten zmysłowo otula ciało, jednocześnie akcentując największe jego atuty. Bali to połączenie seksapilu i szyku.
Styl:
komfortowy, dopasowany dzięki elastycznej satynie elegancki, luksusowy długość haleczki mierzona po szwie bocznym (od pachy w dół): ok.62cm.
Materiał:
wysokogatunkowa , mięsista satyna odpowiednia miękkość po wewnętrznej stronie lekkość miękka koronka
Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
regulowane naramki bielizna pakowana w śliczne, duże opakowanie (idealne na prezent) skład materiału: 90% poliester, 10% elastan. Splot satynowy.

o.name: HALKA TAHITI (satyna)
o.desc:
Koszulka Tahiti wykonana z najwyższej jakości satyny w szarym kolorze z nadrukiem delikatnych pudrowych różyczek to kolejna propozycja marki Kalimo zaslugująca niewątpliwie na uwagę. Do wykonania tego modelu użyto niezwykle miękką, delikatną satynę, która otula kobiecie ciało niczym letni podmuch wiatru. Dekolt zdobi romantyczna koronka, która doskonale eksponuje kobiecy biust. Halka Tahiti została stworzona z myślą o najbardziej wymagających klientkach.
Styl:
komfortowy, dopasowany dzięki elastycznej satynie elegancki, luksusowy długość haleczki mierzona po szwie bocznym (od pachy w dół): ok.57.
Materiał:

Dodatkowe cechy produktu:
